entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
